definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Romanenko is also one of few explorers to have visited Wrangel Island.
sentences.chinese: 罗曼年科也是到过弗兰格尔岛的少数探险家之一。

sentences.english: With heavy knapsacks on their backs, the explorers plodded on their way up the snow-covered mountains.
sentences.chinese: 探险家们身背沉重的背包，吃力地，一步步地爬上。

sentences.english: Explorers and tourists find their directions with the aids of compass and timekeeper.
sentences.chinese: 有了指南针和时区定位，探险家和游人不再迷路。

sentences.english: The country has become the dreamland for many tourists and adventure lovers.
sentences.chinese: 这个国度成为了旅行者跟探险家梦牵魂回的地方。

sentences.english: Zheng He was a mous Chinese explorer.
sentences.chinese: 郑和是一位著名的中国探险家。

sentences.english: Voss is the masterpiece of the famous Australian writer, Patrick White.
sentences.chinese: 《探险家沃斯》是澳大利亚著名作家怀特的代表作。

sentences.english: Undaunted by danger, the explorers continued into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 无视于危险，探险家继续深入丛林。

sentences.english: Was it an early Portuguese explorer who traveled up the Mangoky River?
sentences.chinese: 是早期沿着曼戈基河逆流而上的葡萄牙探险家吗？

sentences.english: It's toilsome of explorer to work.
sentences.chinese: 探险家的工作是很艰苦的。

sentences.english: Three British explorers are about to embark on a survey to map the Arctic Ocean's sea-ice cover.
sentences.chinese: 三位英国探险家即将启程对北冰洋海冰进行勘查。

sentences.english: Those explorers gallantly adventured on unknown seas.
sentences.chinese: 那些探险家们大胆地在陌生的海域探险。

sentences.english: Canadian explorer and fur trader. Born in Bennington, N.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大毛皮商和探险家。

sentences.english: When did the American explorer, R. E. Byrd become the first man to fly over the South Pole?
sentences.chinese: 美国探险家什么时候成为飞越南极的第一人？

sentences.english: I get to be an explorer like the nineteenth-century explorers.
sentences.chinese: 我想成为一个像十九世纪探险家一样的探险者。

sentences.english: Think of the discomforts endured by explorers in the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 试想一想南极探险家忍受的艰难困苦。

sentences.english: Modern-day explorers set out in spacecraft to explore the moon and the universe.
sentences.chinese: 现在的探险家们，乘坐宇宙飞船，去探索月球和宇宙。

definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
Sven Hedin (1865-1952), famous Swedish adventurer and archaeologist, whose 1894-1900 Central Asian expeditions uncovered Kroraina or Loulan 樓蘭|楼兰
Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506)/Columbus, capital of Ohio
Nikolai Mikhailovich Przevalski (1839-1888), Russian explorer who made four expeditions to Central Asian from 1870/abbr. to 普氏
pinyin: Pu3 er3 re4 wa3 er3 si1 ji1

definition: Stein (name)/Marc Aurel Stein (1862-1943), British adventurer and archaeologist who explorer Xinjiang in early 20th century
